content.description: Sit start with hands on the lip. From there, traverse left along the lip using edges, bumps, and slopers. At the traverse's end, throw a heel on top, and crank up through some difficult edges to finish the problem.
content.protection: A pad or two will work. The landing has a downed tree at the end that would be wise to cover.
content.location: It climbs the south of Chantee.

content.description: Sit start matched on the lowest edge with a high toe hook. From there, gain the massive shelf, follow to a great edge, crank up to a set of edges on the slab, and finish up the remainder to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing is very good.
content.location: It climbs the north face of Chantee.

content.description: Sit start with the lowest pair of edges. From there, ascend the crimp-ladder, veer left at the upper half to an edge, reach the lip, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pad will do. The landing is good.
content.location:
It climbs the west face of Chantee, just left of

Czarist Vigor

.

content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing is perfect.
content.location: It traverses the north face of Chantee.

content.description: Sit start from the lowest edge. From there, work up the crimp ladder steering slight right near the end to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad. The landing is very good.
content.location: It climbs the west face of Chantee.

content.description: Sit start matched on a perfect edge with feet pasted. From there, gain the arete, and continue up it to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad will do. The landing is very good.
content.location: It climbs the west of side of the boulder's south arete.
